channel.title: Comments on: What Is A Service Designer and Why Do You Care?

item.title: By: Christopher Shaffer
item.dc:creator: Christopher Shaffer
item.description: I'm excited too! Much like the dropping of "e" from "e-journals" in recognition of the fact that the divide between print and electronic is artificial, this is a move toward recognizing that people who interact with the library do so in multiple formats, and they shouldn't be considered in isolation.
item.content:encoded: I’m excited too! Much like the dropping of “e” from “e-journals” in recognition of the fact that the divide between print and electronic is artificial, this is a move toward recognizing that people who interact with the library do so in multiple formats, and they shouldn’t be considered in isolation.
